title: Blindroid
summary: Blindroid will change the form you call.
description: Blindroid allows you to call contacts easily and fast, it doesn't matter in which application you are. Just shake your device, it will vibrate and a speech recognice window will appear. Wwhen you hear the sound, say the contact name and that's it!-This application must have installed Google Search to work, if you don't have it Blindroid will ask you to install it.-Blindroid can work without connection  if you dont have the correct languages installed, but could not recognize   certain names.-If you have any doubt, you can get in touch with me through the application itself.
descriptionHTML:
Blindroid allows you to call contacts easily and fast, it doesn't matter in which application you are. Just shake your device, it will vibrate and a speech recognice window will appear. Wwhen you hear the sound, say the contact name and that's it!

-This application must have installed Google Search to work, if you don't have it Blindroid will ask you to install it.

-Blindroid can work without connection if you dont have the correct languages installed, but could not recognize certain names.

-If you have any doubt, you can get in touch with me through the application itself.
